content.rendered:
Dehradun Travel Guide

Location: Uttarakhand, India
Population: 578,420
Religion: Hinduism 82.53 % | Islam 11.75 % | Christianity 1.06 % | Sikhism 3.50 % | Jainism 0.63 % | Buddhism 0.29 %
Area: 300 Km2
Language: Hindi, Garhwali and English

Weather: 31° C - 20° C

Ideal Duration: 2-3 Days

Best Time: Mar-Jun

Nearest Airport: Dehradun

Crown of majestic snow-capped Shivalik Range amidst the delightful Sal forest, Dehradun’s beauty is a thing of beauty and joy forever. The city has numerous terrains, meandering rivers, pine forests, enchanting valleys, and meadows. This delightful city is perfect for seeking a blend of tranquillity and adventure. It has something for everyone. It’s not too crowded, nor too quiet. It has a balance of nature and as well as city life. Dehradun is a visual treat for nature lovers. Its beautiful valleys and streams invite families, couples, solo travellers, and adventures from far places. Dehradun is where the real fun begins.

There are many things to do in Dehradun. Whether you are into nature, spirituality, shopping, or adventure, it’s a fantastic place for memorable holidays. Nestled in the foothills of the Himalayas, Dehradun’s lush greenery, picturesque valleys, and flowing streams fine-tune the spirit of tired souls looking for solace. The city’s natural beauty also invites honeymoon couples for blissful moments of togetherness. Families often visit Dehradun with their kids for the summer holidays as it enjoys a moderate climate throughout the year. For those seeking a thrill, paragliding, skiing, cycling, trekking, and mountain climbing promises a kick-off adventure trip in Dehradun.

It’s a destination that cradles the desires of every kind of traveller. For spiritually inclined wanderers, the revered temples and serene surroundings nourish the soul with positive vibes. Places like the divine Tapkeshwar Temple, Sahastradhara, Laxman Siddh Temple, Guru Ram Rai Darbar Sahib, and Mindrolling Monastery allow the wanderers to connect with their inner selves amid blissful surroundings.

The bustling markets of Dehradun dazzle travellers with products that reflect the cultural essence of the city. You will find traditional Garhwali artefacts, handicrafts, woollen garments, and souvenirs to gift your loved ones. Apart from the delightful markets, Dehradun also offers a variety of local delicacies at street food stalls. The food of Dehradun shows the cultural richness of the city. When you explore the food scene of Dehradun, try Aloo Ke Gutke, Kumaoni Raita, Kafuli, Baadi, Arsa, Gahat Ki Dal, Momos, and Tibetan cuisines. The variety of unique dishes displays the unique flavours of Uttarakhand. The local cuisines of Dehradun showcase the diverse culture of the region. Each dish tells a story of the region’s unique culinary traditions.

The warmth and hospitality of the people of Dehradun invite wanderers to interact without hesitation with the local way of life. The city’s harmonious blend of everything leaves a lasting impression on tourists. The panoramic views, food, tourist attractions, and adventure activities compel every traveller to live here forever. One finds a refreshing escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life. It’s a feast for the senses. The echoes of bliss resonate in the air when you immerse yourself in the beauty of enchanting valleys. Those planning a trip to Dehradun will enrich their soul with the charm of diverse culture and natural beauty. So, don’t wait for anything. If you are thinking about Dehradun, pack your bags for a memorable holiday with your loved ones.

About Dehradun

The quaint Hill station of Dehradun is bliss of snow-capped Shivalik range. It is a favourite with travellers seeking solace and relaxation away from the hustle and bustle of city life. With the abundance of mesmerizing terrains to trekking and scenic natural attractions, Dehradun’s views made every wanderer’s heart happy. Discovering Dehradun is like listening to the tales of tranquillity. The cool breeze and the panoramic views of this enchanting hill station made every step a delight.

Wandering through the town, the bustling markets, lip-smacking street food at the food stalls, friendly faces, and delightful tourist attractions make it the most sought-after destination for travellers seeking rejuvenation in the mountains. The city is a beautiful canvas painted in nature’s finest colours. Mesmerizing natural attractions like Sahastradhara, Jim Corbett, Chakrata, Malsi Deer Park, Lakha Mandal, and Nag Tibba make you want to stay here forever.

It is a home to many spiritual sites to connect with your soul. You must visit Maya Devi Temple, Tapkeshwar Temple, Lakha Mandal, Paonta Sahib, and Mindrolling Monastery for mental rejuvenation. According to a legend, Lord Rama and his brother Laxmana performed hard penance to kill the demon Ravana. Another story associated with Dehradun is that Guru Dronacharya of the epic Mahabharata resided and performed penance in Dehradun. These stories were integral to the cultural stories that contributed to the mythical charm of enchanting Dehradun.

Also, embarking on adventures in Dehradun is a thrilling and rewarding experience. Dehradun offers a unique blend of adrenaline-pumping activities amidst the majestic Himalayas. The region around Dehradun boasts a plethora of trekking trails like Nag Tibba Trek, Har Ki Dun Trek, Chakrata Trek, Kedarkantha Trek, and Deoria Tal Trek, offering an opportunity to connect with nature and explore the Himalayan landscapes. You will also get numerous camping spots to spend nights under the star-lit Himalayan sky. The paragliding experiences in Dehradun offer an unmatched perspective of the enchanting valleys below. The hilly terrains of Dehradun are also perfect for mountain biking enthusiasts. Bikers can explore scenic routes, dense forests, and meandering paths, adding thrill to the journey.

Trying the cuisines of Dehradun is the best way to explore the local way of life. Dehradun’s flavourful cuisines captivate every palate. Dehradun has a variety of influences when it comes to food. You can find North Indian, Tibetan, and even continental cuisines for a wholesome culinary experience. Dehradun’s natural beauty, cultural richness, and adventure opportunities leave a lasting impression on the minds of travellers. For those seeking a deep connection with the soul of Dehradun, the city’s fascinating history and culture add a unique dimension to the travel experience.

Holiday Packages

Our enchanting tour packages will enable you to explore the natural beauty and cultural richness of Dehradun according to your budget and convenience. We have amazing offers for people on honeymoons, family vacations, solo trips, adventures, and more. Our holiday packages offer a tour of vibrant local markets, and architectural grandeur, strolling in serene Himalayan landscapes and hopping divine destinations, ensuring an unforgettable experience. You also don’t have to worry about your wallet. Our holiday packages are both cost-effective and eco-friendly. Our carefully crafted itinerary understands the importance of the delightful experience of Dehradun without straining your budget. If you want to imbibe the charm of picturesque Dehradun, book the best Dehradun tourism package with us.

Things to Do

Dehradun tourism offers enchanting offerings with a plethora of activities to tourists. The day never gets dull in Dehradun. From nature’s wonders to cultural gems, Dehradun promises a diverse escape for every traveller. Nature lovers can revel in the scenic beauty of Dehradun; spirituality seekers can find solace in the divine destinations of Dehradun; adventure lovers and backpackers can indulge in trekking and water activities; shopaholics can go crazy in the delightful chaos of the bustling markets. No matter what kind of traveller you are, Dehradun always gives you something to cherish for a memorable holiday.
